description: Useful for resolving technical support requests, troubleshooting software and hardware issues, and handling Jira-related problems. The input must be a complete question.

Useful for searching for general information on the Internet using Google search. Use this agent when you need to find current information, news, guides, or answers to general questions that require web search.
A versatile agent that can handle various utility tasks including web searches, calendar checks, and weather information. Use this as a fallback when other agents don't match the request.
An advanced AI assistant powered by Google ADK with multi-tool capabilities and workflow orchestration
